ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: those who affirm the Day of Judgement,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And those who believe in the Day of Judgement,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: those who firmly believe in the Day of Recompense,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: who acknowledge the Day of Judgment,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And those who believe the Day of Judgement to be true.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And those who believe in the Day of Recompense.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And those who accept the truth of the judgment day
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: who confirm the Day of Doom
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And those who believe in the Day of Judgment,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and those who believe in the Day of Judgement
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And those who testify to the Day of Requital.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and who affirm the Day of Retribution,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And those who hold to the truth of the Day of Judgment;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And those who believe in the Day of Recompense,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: who confirm the Day of Reckoning
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And those who affirm the Day of Judgment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And those who believe in the Day of Recompense
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [70:26]   and who affirm the truth of the Day of Judgement, [of] Requital,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And those who believe in the Day of Judgement) and those who believe in the Day of Reckoning and all that which is in it,
